pli-tv-pvr4:81.1: Ṭhapetvā satta āpattiyo satta āpattikkhandhe, avasesā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr4:81.6: Ṭhapetvā satta āpattiyo satta āpattikkhandhe avasesā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ na katamaṁ vipattiṁ bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr4:81.7: Sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ na katamena āpattikkhandhena saṅgahitā.
pli-tv-pvr4:81.8: Channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ na katamena āpattisamuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhanti.
pli-tv-pvr4:81.10: Sattannaṁ samathānaṁ na katamena samathena sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr4:81.12: Ṭhapetvā satta āpattiyo satta āpattikkhandhe, natthaññā āpattiyoti.
